name: RoyalSmart
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Royal Smart is an app that connects to doorbells, thermostats, lights, sensors, and other products using Wi-Fi or Bluetooth. 

Connect Alexa to your Royal Smart products in a few simple steps:
1. Download “Royal Smart” app in app market then register an account (or log in directly if you already have an account);
2. Configure our devices in “Royal Smart” app and name the devices;
3. Enable “Royal Smart” skill, you'll be navigated to the login page, follow the instructions on the page to complete linking;
4. Tell Echo ""Alexa, discover my devices"". Wait for Echo to say “Search complete”.

Once done, Alexa will simply operate and monitor your devices; a few of the numerous commands mentioned below are examples of what you may ask Alexa.

For thermostat: 
Alexa set my home temperature to 20° until 8 PM
Alexa set my home temperature to 20° for 35 minutes
Alexa resume thermostat schedule 
Alexa what is the temperature in my bedroom?
Alexa what temprature is the basement set to
Alexa increase the temperature by 2°
Alexa decrease the temperature by 2°
Alexa turn off thermostat
Alexa turn on thermostat
Alexa turn on fan

For Doorbell
Alexa show me who is in front of my door or show me front door camera
Alexa Turn on night mode

For Alarm 
Alexa disarm alarm
Alexa arm the house
Alexa Do you detect any motion in kitchen area

For Leak señor 
Alexa How much water was used today
Alexa How much water did we use on the weekend
Alexa How much water was used in the month
Alexa how much water was used in a year
Do I have any pending alerts

For Smoke señor 
Alexa is set to “Away”, Alexa uses the built-in microphone to detect the sounds of a smoke alarm, CO alarm, or glass breaking. 

For cameras 
Alexa show garage camera
Alexa Hide living room camera
Alexa (Area) what can be shown
 For lock 
Alexa Lock front door
Alexa unlock front door
Alexa is the front door locked

For curtains 
Alexa open the curtains
Alexa close the curtains 
Alexa open curtains halfway

For lighting 
Alexa turn on backyard lighting 
Alexa turn off lighting
Alexa keep lights on until five
Alexa adjust the brightness
Alexa Turn on light to 50%

Alexa is compatible with all Royal Smart products
